text: The [[halfling]] [[Karrnath]]i warlord Asta Vanalan commanded [[Fort Deepdark]] during final decade of the [[Last War]], and [[Kaius|Kaius ir'Wynarn III]] recognized her service by granting her dominion over the nearby lands previously ruled by the ir’Jennrei line; while this technically [[ennobles|Nobility of the Five Nations]] her, Vanalan rarely employs the ir’ honorific. The Vanalan family has deep roots in [[Rekkenmark]], and Asta is working to impose more traditional Karrnathi culture on the [[kleynam]]s within her domain; this includes an effort to convince Karrns from the west to resettle in the region. As a warlord, Asta has passed the daily duties of command of [[Deepdark|Fort Deepdark]] to commander [[Brandin ir'Dulinch]], but Deepdark remains the seat of her power.
title: Asta Vanalan
